title: Degree to radian
description: Write a programme to convert degree to radian
contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert degree to radian

Input  : 1
Output : 0.0174533

# Write a programme to convert degree to radian
import math

degrees = float(input("Input degrees : "))

radian = degrees*(math.pi/180)

print("\nRadian :", round(radian, 5))


// Write a programme to convert degree to radian

function degrees_to_radians(degrees) {
  var pi = Math.PI;
  return degrees * (pi / 180);
}

degree = 1;
console.log("Input  : " + degree);
console.log("Output : " + degrees_to_radians(degree).toFixed(5));
